text: <@U02AUNA0P>: Flemming has some questions regarding app store copy and screnshots – should that go your way?
(he’s looking for the most recent app store description and what’s new)
<@U06DFL7BP> yeah, could you forward it to me?
fwded - screen shots question and latest app store copy - sent you the latest I / John had
Okay thanks! Almost to the office, will take a look once I get in.
thanks!

copy question: 

“LEGO Movie Maker works on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad devices with camera and supports operating systems of iOS5 and up”.

is this correct? or is it supposed to be iOS 6?
Current app store version lists iOS 5 - i don’t know the discussion around this update, though
<@U026PT0D7>, we dropped iOS 5, correct?
spencer’s out today - let me look at the contract :simple_smile:
ah okay. i recall us going over supporting iOS 6 as the oldest firmware (to keep the 3GS), but don’t quote me on that.
this was a while back too
i very much hope so

outside of that, the copy looks good to me.

and about the screenshot question, yes they should be in that order if possible.
ok great
this version of the app supports iOS 6.1 and up.
anyone on iOS 5 won't be able to see it in the store, they'll only see the previous version
should be iOS 6.1
oh hello!
hi. bye.
lol
OK phillip, i’ll adjust that to "iOS6.1 and up” and send along
sounds good, thanks!
